data.title: 16 Western Inspired Honeymoon Destinations
data.meta_description: Rocky Mountain Bride is breaking down our top 16 favorite western-inspired honeymoon destinations.
data.text:
November 19, 2022

If you are looking for a western-inspired honeymoon destination, you have found yourself in the right place! We are breaking down our top 16 western-inspired honeymoon destinations and we can’t wait to share them with you. Get ready to be immersed in nature, experience incredible adventures together, and stay at some of the best kept secret ranch properties in the United States!

1. The Ranch at Rock Creek

@theranchatrockcreek | theranchatrockcreek.com

Experience the wild, wild, west like never before at The Ranch at Rock Creek in Philipsburg, Montana. Located in one of the state’s most pristine valleys, this Forbes voted five-star ranch and its scenic surroundings, is nothing short of romantic. Western and hospitality go hand in hand and at this ranch, it’s no different. Every guest is provided a dedicated Ranch Ambassador as a luxury concierge service. The Ranch at Rock Creek has their own signature spa and exclusive chef’s that prepare dinner with ranch-to-table cuisine. Dance under the moonlight out west on your honeymoon at The Ranch at Rock Creek.

Photos sourced by The Ranch at Rock Creek Facebook

2. Vista Verde Guest Ranch

@vistaverde | vistaverde.com

Welcome to the Rocky Mountains at the Vista Verde Guest Ranch. Located just north of Steamboat Springs, Colorado you will find the perfect combination of a luxury ranch and cabin life with a mix of true, Western hospitality. Whether you are looking for adventure or relaxation, you can experience the best of both worlds at Vista Verde Guest Ranch. On the ranch, activities are endless. From horseback riding, fly fishing, adventures on the trails, incredible stargazing and so much more. Surrounded by the mountains and engulfed in nature, this picturesque ranch is truly a breathtaking and romantic honeymoon destination.

Photos sourced by Vista Verde Ranch Facebook

3. Triple Creek Ranch

@triplecreekranch | triplecreekranch.com

Pack your bags and check into your all-inclusive mountain ranch resort. This luxury, oasis is the ultimate western getaway. Indulge in the western lifestyle with mountain views as far as the eye can see. Adventures or nearby experiences are waiting to be had like fly-fishing, hiking, horseback riding, driving cattle to greener pasture, whitewater rafting, unmatched scenic drives through the valley and so much more. Indulge in the relaxing nature and book a couples massage, yoga or guided meditation. Feel alive in the mountains of Montana on your honeymoon getaway at Triple Creek Ranch.

Photos sourced by Triple Creek Ranch’s Facebook

4. The Resort at Paws Up

@theresortatpawsup | pawsup.com

Located on sprawling 7,000 acres in Western Montana, The Resort at Paws Up is famously known as “America’s Private National Park”. Sleep under the stars in a sophisticated tent or in a luxury private home at this mountain resort. This unique property is an authentic working cattle ranch with incredible surrounding wilderness and mountain views. Enjoy luxury culinary experiences at Pomo, an award-winning restaurant at the resort. Spend your days horseback riding, fishing in the nearby waters, or perhaps our personal honeymoon favorite, indulge in some self-care at the signature spa on the property. The Resort at Paws Up can’t wait to welcome you to your western-inspired Montana honeymoon!

Photos sourced by The Resort at Paws Up Facebook

5. Sorrel River Ranch

@sorrelriverranch | sorrelriver.com

Experience the luxuries of Utah at the Sorrel River Ranch. Inspired by the wild, wild, west, this ranch is located on 240 acres of endless mountain top views. Book a custom-built cabin designed with western-inspired art and architectural design. Step outside your cabin to the sound of the water flowing in the Colorado River and views of the mountains as far as the eye can see. One of our favorites, once in a lifetime, honeymoon adventures you just have to book here is a romantic hot air balloon ride over the breathtaking Utah scenery. Experience other adventures together at the Sorrel River Ranch like Colorado river rafting, skydiving, horseback riding in the canyons, exploring the Arches or Canyonlands National Park, and so much more. Adventure awaits at the Sorrel River Ranch!

Photos sourced by Sorrel River Ranch Facebook

6. The Lodge at Blue Sky

@blueskyauberge | aubergeresorts.com/bluesky

Get back to your western roots, with a luxury twist and reconnect with nature on your honeymoon at The Lodge at Blue Sky. Located in Park City, Utah, accommodations like the lodge or creek houses are perfectly placed within the mountain peaks and valleys for you and your new husband/wife to sight see as far as the eye can see. With western-inspired style and decor, you will get that cozy, mountainous feel but with a luxury touch! Explore the farm to table culinary experiences or book a private, romantic dinner on a mountain top yurt. Western-inspired honeymoons are not complete unless some hiking, fly fishing or horseback riding are offered and The Lodge at Blue Sky offers just that. Book your honeymoon today at The Lodge at Blue Sky!

Photos sourced by The Lodge at Blue Sky Facebook

7. Alisal Ranch

@alisalranch | alisal.com

Book your California dreaming honeymoon with a western flare at the Alisal Ranch in Santa Ynez Valley. Located just 30 minutes outside of Santa Barbara on 10,500 acres, this picturesque ranch is infused with its California charm and western-inspired style in every guest room, suite or cottage. Find your zen in the of serene atmosphere of the Alisal Ranch with a luxury spa, right on the property. Indulge in luxury culinary experiences or horseback riding through the incredible California canyons. California is calling at Alisal Ranch.

Photos sourced by Alisal Ranch Facebook

8. Devil’s Thumb

@devilsthumbranch | devilsthumbranch.com

Experience the wilderness in the west like never before on an authentic Colorado ranch. The Devil’s Thumb welcomes you to experience true western hospitality and adventures. Order that cowboy hat with feathers that you have been eyeing because the Devil’s Thumb is the perfect place for it. Accommodations included modern lodges, private cabins, five-star restaurants nearby, and a signature spa. Horseback ride throughout the Rocky Mountains, fly fish in nearby waters surrounded by the swaying pine trees, zip line through 6,500 acres of wilderness, or cross-country ski through the property. Immerse yourself in the western lifestyle on your honeymoon at the Devil’s Thumb!

Photos sourced by Devil’s Thumb Facebook

9. Ranch at Emerald Valley

@thebroadmoor | thebroadmoor.com

Indulge in an all-inclusive, wilderness retreat surrounded by 100,000 acres of the Pike National Forest at the Ranch at Emerald Valley in Colorado Springs, CO. Choose from thirteen exclusive cabins featuring gas fireplaces, modern amenities, an outdoor hot tub, and a private terrace. As a guest, experience exclusive culinary dishes brought to you by an onsite Broadmoor chef. The Ranch at Emerald Valley offers endless adventures like horseback riding, fly fishing, mountain biking, canoeing, evening campfires and so much more. Take a deep breath of the fresh mountain air while enjoying panoramic views of the wilderness surroundings, right from your cabin on your honeymoon at the Ranch at Emerald Valley.

Photos sourced by The Broadmoor Facebook

10. Rancho Las Cascadas

@rancholascascadas | ranchoslascascadas.com

Hola, Mexico! Book an all-inclusive honeymoon with a western flare on the Rancho Las Cascadas. Explore the countryside surrounded by cacti, mountains, and flowers that line the resort property. Indulge in an all-inclusive ranch getaway with complimentary dining and drinks, unlimited horseback riding adventures, and mountain biking or guided hikes throughout the nearby areas. Need a day to relax? The Rancho Las Cascadas has you covered. Spend your day in the sun at the infinity pool, wellness classes or the hot tub with incredible waterfall views. Book your western inspired honeymoon at the Rancho Las Cascadas in Mexico today!

Photos sourced by Rancho Las Cascadas Facebook

11. Siwash Lake

@siwahlake | siwashlake.com

Honeymoon at Siwash Lake and indulge in the western lifestyle in British Columbia. Located on 10,000 acres, this family run peaceful and romantic oasis is surrounded by wilderness, rolling hills, lakes and meadows. Choose from luxury accommodations like glamping tents, a barn loft, or rooms in the main Ranch House on the property. With its hide open spaces, stargazing at night is nothing short of an incredible experience. Indulge in what makes this property connect to its western roots; from its culinary experiences with farm fresh cuisine to adventures like fly fishing, horseback riding, or white river rafting. Honeymoon under the stars at the Siwash Lake!

Photos sourced by Siwash Lake Facebook

12. Dunton Hot Springs

@dutonhotsprings | dutonhotsprings.com

No matter what time of the year you decide to book your stay at Dunton Hot Springs, this honeymoon destination will not disappoint. If you are looking for the perfect combination of western-inspired, exclusive, and romantic, we have found the perfect spot for you. This small, yet exclusive resort is in the San Juan Mountains in Colorado. Known as a romantic 1800’s ghost town, this old mining town offers log cabin accommodations, saloon serving cuisine, a spa and what makes the Dunton Hot Springs famous, the hot springs. Step outside your log cabin and listen to the waterfalls on your honeymoon at Dunton Hot Springs!

Photos sourced by Dunton Hot Springs Facebook

13. Collective Retreats Vail

@collectiveretreats | collectiveretreats.com

Book a honeymoon retreat like never before in the mountains of Vail, Colorado. The Collective at Vail was inspired by its authentic western heritage and one of the most dreamy and romantic scenery that surround the land around you. Sleep under the stars in the indoor, outdoor living space with the Summit Tent. With western-inspired architectural design and decorative patters, you will be immersed in nature, with a luxury feel. Explore some of our favorite experiences at the Collective like bubbly and branding, wellness trails, horseback riding, picnic lunches, sage happy hours by the fire, fly fishing and so much more. Take a deep breath of mountain air and book your honeymoon at the Collective Retreat at Vail!

Photos sourced by Collective Retreats Vail Facebook

14. Moonlight Basin

@moonlightbasin | moonlightbasin.com

Honeymoon at the Moonlight Basin in none other than, Big Sky, Montana. No matter what time of year you decide to book your honeymoon, every season is the best season in Montana. In the winter months, you can stay at a luxury ski in and ski out home in the mountains. Or, in the warmer months, stay at one of the exclusive lodge or smaller cabins on the property. At Moonlight Basin, you have access to the nearby Big Sky Resort for world class skiing or access to Yellowstone Park for fly fishing and hiking. Step into your western-inspired roots with experiences like archery, horseback riding, mountain biking or canoeing on the Ulery Lake. Why wait? Book your honeymoon at Moonlight Basin today!

Photos sourced by Moonlight Basin Facebook

15. Brush Creek Ranch

@brushcreekranch | brushcreekranch.com

An all-inclusive, luxury ranch nestled on 30,000 acres of the Great American West, need we say more? Book your honeymoon at the Brush Creek Ranch in Saratoga, Wyoming. Take a deep breath of fresh mountain air and be fully immersed in nature and the surrounding lush forests and rolling hills. Accommodations on the ranch include western-style lodging with incredible mountain views. Experiences and adventures are endless. From horseback riding, a 600-acre private ski mountain, fly fishing, archery, ATV adventures, ice fishing and so much more. Don’t miss out on savoring the flavors of farm to table luxury culinary experiences for date night at Brush Creek Ranch. The Brush Creek Ranch can’t wait to welcome you to your luxury, western-inspired honeymoon in Wyoming!

Photos sourced by Brush Creek Ranch Facebook

16. Bishops Lodge

@bishopslodge | aubergeresorts.com/bishopslodge

Be immersed in culture and nature of Mexico when booking at honeymoon at the luxurious, Bishops Lodge. Located in Santa Fe, Mexico, book your perfect honeymoon stay with accommodations that include guest rooms, suites, casitas or a 12-room bunkhouse. All rooms are uniquely designed with the textures and colors of the surrounding mountains and Santa Fe art. With the Santa Fe National Forest so close, you will have access straight from the property! You and your new husband/wife can book the most incredible experiences during your stay at the Bishops Lodge. Horseback riding through the mountains, fly fish in nearby waters, hike the Sangre de Cristo Mountains, or book a private meditation class. The Bishops Lodge in Santa Fe has something for everyone. Book your honeymoon at the Bishops Lodge today!
